page.title: 02Corston - Traffic
page.content: The village of{Corston}is situated on a busy main road,the A 429 from Chippenham to Cirencester.We conducted a{traffic survey}between 10-11 am on Thurs.11th July.Friday,market day in {Chippenham,}is the busiest day of the week.The results were as follows:-Cars 184;motor cycles 3; bicycles 1;lorries 38;vans 44; buses 2.Looking at the registrations we discovered that most of the vehicles came from Wiltshire and the surrounding areas like Bristol, Gloucestershire and Somerset.One car was from Ireland.The road is quite twisty through the village,and there is a speed limit of 40 m.p.h.The bridge over the river used to be quite dangerous,until it was improved recently.We were told that the improvements to the bridge were speeded up because the local M.P.drove into it.
